amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Fair Housing and Equal Opportuntity account by $5,820,000 and decrease the Working Capital Fund by $5,820,000.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Green, Al amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
